                                java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String lastName,
                                java.lang.String phone,
                                java.lang.String adress)
        addUser

        desc:

        this method creates an object of type user adds it to the list and creates the coded turn
        Parameters:
        documentNumber - This parameter refers to the user's document number,string type
        documentType - This parameter refers to the user's document Type,string type
        name - This parameter refers to the user's name,string type
        lastName - This parameter refers to the user's last Name,string type
        phone - This parameter refers to the user's phone,string type
        adress - This parameter refers to the user's adress,string type
        Returns:
        this method returns a message confirming that the user was created whit user information and the shift

      • repeated

        public java.lang.String repeated(java.lang.String document)
                          throws RepeatedUserException
        repeated

        desc:

        This method is in charge of searching the list if the user is registered, if he or she throws an exception and if you send us a message
        Parameters:
        document - This parameter refers to the user's document number,string type
        Returns:
        This method returns the message of the exception or a message confirming that the user is not repeated
        Throws:
        RepeatedUserException - send a message in case the user has already been registered

      • searchDocument

        public java.lang.String searchDocument(java.lang.String documentNumber)
        searchDocument

        desc:

        This method is in charge of searching the list if the user is registered, If the user is registered, return a message with the name, phone number and turn
        Parameters:
        documentNumber - This parameter refers to the user's document number,string type
        Returns:
        This method returns the message a message whit the user information or message in which the information was not found

                              throws java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException
        verification

        desc:

        TThis method verifies that the text string entered by the user contains data
        Parameters:
        info - This parameter refers to the string of characters entered by the user
        Returns:
        returns a message confirming that the data is correct or incorrect
        Throws:
        java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException - does not allow strings to be entered without data
